samples.question: And my first, my third advice?
samples.transcript: Let me think. Oh yeah, you should stop when you need to because, when you do not know what to say, you will tend to put a lot of filler words in it and it would make your speech sound very clumsy. So yeah, just take a break and rearrange your thoughts very carefully. And to be honest, a short speech is always better than one that ends with filler words. Okay, thank you for coming here and joining me to be with us. Thank you so much. IELTS Fighter. Tien phong phổ cập IELTS trong người Việt.
samples.transcript_original: Let me think. Oh yeah, you should stop when you need to because, uh, when you don't know what to say, you will tend to put a lot of filler words in it and it would make your speech sound very clumsy. So yeah, just take a break and rearrange your thoughts very carefully. And to be honest, a short speech is always better than one that ends with filler words. Okay, thank you for coming here and joining me to be with us. Thank you so much. IELTS Fighter. Tien phong phổ cập IELTS trong người Việt.

Oh yeah, you should stop when you need to because, when you do not know what to say, you will tend to put a lot of filler words in it and it would make your speech sound very clumsy. samples.question: Do you have friends?
samples.transcript: Yes, I do have a lot of friends. I am an extrovert, so I like talking to a lot of people.
samples.transcript_original: Yes, I do have a lot of friends. I'm an extrovert, so I like talking to a lot of people.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Yes, I do have a lot of friends. I am an extrovert, so I like talking to a lot of people.

samples.question: How do you usually contact your friends?
samples.transcript: I like to contact my friends over the phone through video chat or voice chat. I mostly prefer video chatting my friends because I feel like it is more personal and engaging. And it also allows me to express my emotions clearly.
samples.transcript_original: I like to contact my friends over the phone through video chat or voice chat. I mostly prefer video chatting my friends because I feel like it's more personal and engaging. And it also allows me to express my emotions clearly.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I like to contact my friends over the phone through video chat or voice chat. I mostly prefer video chatting my friends because I feel like it is more personal and engaging. And it also allows me to express my emotions clearly.

samples.question: Do you prefer to contact different people in different ways?
samples.transcript: Yes, I do like to contact different people in different ways because I am not comfortable talking to everyone in the same platform, using the same platform. For example, when it comes to someone I am close with, I like to call them. On the other hand, when it comes to someone I am not too close with, I like to email them or text them.
samples.transcript_original: Yes, I do like to contact different people in different ways because I'm not comfortable talking to everyone in the same platform, using the same platform. For example, when it comes to someone I'm close with, I like to call them. On the other hand, when it comes to someone I'm not too close with, I like to email them or text them.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Yes, I do like to contact different people in different ways because I am not comfortable talking to everyone in the same platform, using the same platform. For example, when it comes to someone I am close with, I like to call them. On the other hand, when it comes to someone I am not too close with, I like to email them or text them.

samples.question: Do you find it easy to keep in contact with friends and family?
samples.transcript: Yes, I do find it easy to keep in contact with friends and family members because I feel like I can use different apps for texting them or communicating with them.
samples.transcript_original: Yes, I do find it easy to keep in contact with friends and family members because I feel like I can use different apps for texting them or communicating with them.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Yes, I do find it easy to keep in contact with friends and family members because I feel like I can use different apps for texting them or communicating with them.

samples.question: In your country, did people in the past keep in contact in the same ways as they do today?
samples.transcript: In my country, we do not use the same form of communication as we used to do in the past because a lot has changed. For example, in the past, we used to send people letters or use LAN telephones. And it has changed a lot now. Okay so.
samples.transcript_original: In my country, we don't use the same form of communication as we used to do in the past because a lot has changed. For example, in the past, we used to send people letters or use LAN telephones. And it has changed a lot now. Okay so.
samples.transcript_cleaned: In my country, we do not use the same form of communication as we used to do in the past because a lot has changed. For example, in the past, we used to send people letters or use LAN telephones. And it has changed a lot now.

samples.question: Would you like to start now, please?
samples.transcript: Yes. A party that I genuinely enjoyed was my birthday party, which was held last year on the 11th of August at my place. It was a surprise party and I really liked it because my friends surprised me and it happened all of a sudden. And my best friend came from Canada after four years, which was very unexpected for me. the good thing about the party was that it had different stations in different corners of the room. For example, it had an art station, music station, so we were allowed to do whatever we wanted. there was this one particular thing that we did that was very memorable for me was we took our handprint on the canvas for the memory, which I still have it stored because my friends left for abroad. And whenever I look at it, it makes me feel better. So that was the best part about the party that was held. And I felt really happy because people do not do such things anymore. And it was all of a sudden and it was very special for me. Okay Thank you very much May you have the.

And whenever I look at it, it makes me feel better. So that was the best part about the party that was held. And I felt really happy because people do not do such things anymore. samples.question: Is this ever true in your country?
samples.transcript: In my country, yes, it is true that we spend a lot of money on parties because it is very unique and special for us. So I feel like spending a lot of money means a lot to us and like as in doing different activities and like keeping it close to our heart.

samples.question: Do you think this trend is good or bad?
samples.transcript: I think this is a good trend, but I do not think that spending a lot of money is good as well. So there has to be a limit. There has to be boundaries.

samples.question: Are there any differences between family parties and parties given by friends?

Okay.

samples.question: Young people or the elderly people?
samples.transcript: In my perspective, I think younger generation enjoys this more because they like to have a lot of fun. Maybe roam around or go outside more and they are more outgoing than the older generation. They like singing, goofing around, dancing. So I think it is the perfect. Celebration for them. So this is the last question for you.

samples.question: Why do you think some people consider that national celebrations are waste of government money?
samples.transcript: I think they think it is a waste of money because they feel like they pay taxes and they are going into wasteful things. But I do not think it is a waste of money because I feel like it brings unity. Because a lot of people are gathering together to celebrate one particular thing. So it is supposed to be a happy moment for everyone. And it is good for your mental health as well. Okay, thank you very much. Thank you, Iya, for joining us. Thanks a lot.

samples.question: Tell me, do you like doing sports or any physical activities?
samples.transcript: I do enjoy a multitude of physical activities. The two of which are biking and swimming, which I enjoy the most. Because I grew up in a background where I had to travel a lot on my own. I enjoy biking a lot and also swimming. I felt in the past that I was not athletic enough as my friends and could not do the same activities as my peers could easily do. But now after trying sports, I feel like I have more, I have a better ability to accomplish physical tasks.
samples.transcript_original: I do enjoy a multitude of physical activities. The two of which are biking and swimming, which I enjoy the most. Because I grew up in a background where I had to travel a lot on my own. I enjoy biking a lot and also swimming. I felt in the past that I wasn't athletic enough as my friends and couldn't do the same activities as my peers could easily do. But now after trying sports, I feel like I have more, I have a better ability to accomplish physical tasks.

But now after trying sports, I feel like I have more, I have a better ability to accomplish physical tasks.
